title: Crime Alert 04.09.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.09.19
description:
A meth smoking Missouri YMCA employee finds out soon if she will be forced to repay cost of cleaning the drug residue out of the building. Faith Hill’s troubled nephew sits in prison awaiting his court date on DUI manslaughter charges. North Carolina cops bust a registered sex offender after a woman jumps from his moving vehicle during a kidnap attempt.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
